timeline.bodyText: Why add the artifactId and version as well?  Is this so it's available for inclusion in the log message?
timeline.author: EricWittmann

replies.bodyText:
Yes.
So that any client can grab that info easily from response.
You do already have that info in some cases, when you explicitly call for a id,version tuple,
but not for latest and per-globalId.
